ComicInfo.Penciller: Chris Allan,Gary Fields,Jim Lawson,Gary Fields,Jim Lawson,Chris Allan
ComicInfo.Summary: The Turtles and Ninjara accompany Sarnath into Dimension X via his space ship. As they approach a black hole in space, they are attacked by members of the Nova Squadron. The Turtles are jettisoned from the ship right before it falls into the black hole. The Turtles are picked up by a splinter faction of the Nova Squadron called the Nova Posse. They land on a local asteroid that serves as a space port and Donatello is abducted while trying to find a bathroom.
ComicInfo.Teams: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles,Sons of Silence
ComicInfo.Title: What the Shredder Did for a Living Before He Was a Super-Villain; Megadeath Part One; Out of the Blue (Into the Black)
ComicInfo.Writer: Chris Allan,Dean Clarrain,Gary Fields,Ryan Brown,Gary Fields,Dean Clarrain,Ryan Brown,Chris Allan
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
